channel.title: Need help with monsters/safespots for pvm
channel.description: Hi is there anyway to make npcs not able to attack through walls or walk through safespots. For example I am creating donator island and I want my kbd to be safespotable behind the wall. It attacks with mage also, so it mages through the wall. Is there anyway I can make it not mage or not be able to hit through safespots?

item.title: Need help with monsters/safespots for pvm
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.source: Need help with monsters/safespots for pvm
